introduction: 1958 Newspaper Association Sweepstakes Winning Broadcast Drama Movie. A heartwarming and moving story that bloomed behind the competition between two newspaper reporters, one young and the other old, who followed the whereabouts of the distressed aircraft. It is an adaptation of the prize-winning broadcast drama recruited by the Japan Newspaper Publishers and Editors Week in 1958. The original author was Tsuneyuki Mori.行方不明機を追う特ダネ記者の記者魂を描く問題作。昭和33年の新聞週間に日本新聞協会が募集した懸賞当選放送劇の映画化。
